title: Japan Joins Germany, China, Vietnam, US, And Other Powerful Nations In Driving Unprecedented Long
desc: Japan has joined Germany, China, Vietnam, the US, and other powerful nations in boosting UAE tourism with an unprecedented surge in long-haul arrivals, driven by Emirates’ ambitious expansion plan.

title: Security team foils stock theft attempt in Samburu
desc: A security operation has thwarted a livestock theft incident in Samburu County, leading to the recovery of 50 goats after an armed confrontation between police officers and suspected raiders.

title: Australian women and children with links to ISIS forced to head back to camp in Syria
desc: The ABC can reveal Australian families with links to Islamic State fighters have left a camp in north-eastern Syria, and will try to begin their journey home to Australia.
